Name: Name
Discovers available disks on all nodes.
Allows you to limit the discovery for av: Allows you to limit the discovery for available disks to specific nodes.
Allows you to discover the available dis: Allows you to discover the available disks on all available nodes
Uses the available disks that match the: Uses the available disks that match the selected filters only on selected nodes.
Disks limit will set the maximum number: Disks limit will set the maximum number of PVs to create on a node. If the field is empty we will create PVs for all available disks on the matching nodes.
A Local Volume Set allows you to filter: A Local Volume Set allows you to filter a set of disks, group them and create a dedicated StorageClass to consume storage from them.
